name: Wikipedia Language Panel re-order
description:
Reorder the language setting panel, move you favorite language to the top.


wikipedia provide a hell lots of language and most of them one can't read & write.
This style allow you to highlight the languages you interested in and move them to the top of the panel.

*******************************
把指定维基百科的语言链接提前。经常要通过不同语言搜索资料的人来说很方便的。
additional_info: CSS3 box model make this possible, which used to be implement with the help of javascript(userscript) You'll need to change the code a bit to fit your language preference.( only a bit, speaking of 2-3 letters ), there is a ABC comment in the code, check it out! Or you can leave a message with the wanted langs, I'll reply you an edited version.
